text: Kardašova Řečice is a town of the Jindřichův Hradec District in the South Bohemian Region of the Czech Republic. == Twin towns == Kardašova Řečice is twinned with: * Oberdiessbach, Switzerland == References == == Other websites == * Official website Category:Towns in the Czech Republic Category:South Bohemian Region
title: Kardašova Řečice
